name: gancio
description: Gancio is a community event platform that helps groups publish events with details, images, and maps. It is federated, privacy-first, and designed for grassroots or local organizations to publish events in a decentralized fashion.

features.title: Federated Events
features.description: Publish and share community events across federated instances for decentralized coordination

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Host events without tracking or data collection, respecting user privacy by default

features.title: Event Publishing
features.description: Create events with rich details, images, descriptions, and location information

features.title: Map Integration
features.description: Display event locations on interactive maps for easy discovery and navigation

features.title: Grassroots Organizing
features.description: Purpose-built for local communities and activist groups to coordinate activities

features.title: Decentralized Network
features.description: Connect with other Gancio instances to share events across federated communities

features.title: No Registration Required
features.description: Allow users to browse and discover events without mandatory account creation

features.title: Community Calendar
features.description: Maintain a shared calendar for local organizations with collaborative event management
